parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From nomos; properly, to do by law, i.e. To accustom; by extension, to deem or regard.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
To consider, understand, perceive. From sun and hiemi; to put together, i.e. to comprehend; by implication, to act piously.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
Feminine of a derivative of soter as noun; rescue or safety.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To consider, understand, perceive. From sun and hiemi; to put together, i.e. to comprehend; by implication, to act piously.
